verses.text: \w In|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* kindness, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w be|strong="H1732"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H1732"\w* me, \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* own great pity blot out \w my|strong="H1732"\w* transgressions.
Wash me clean \w of|strong="H5030"\w* my guilt, make me pure \w of|strong="H5030"\w* my sin.

\w For|strong="H2617"\w* well \w I|strong="H6588"\w* know \w my|strong="H7230"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, \w my|strong="H7230"\w* \w sin|strong="H6588"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* ever before \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

Against \w you|strong="H7235"\w*, \w only|strong="H7235"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w*, \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H5771"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* done \w that|strong="H2403"\w* \w which|strong="H2403"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w wrong|strong="H5771"\w* \w in|strong="H7235"\w* \w your|strong="H7235"\w* sight: \w you|strong="H7235"\w* therefore \w are|strong="H2403"\w* just \w when|strong="H7235"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w* speak, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* clear \w when|strong="H7235"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w* utter judgment.

\w See|strong="H3045"\w*! \w In|strong="H3045"\w* guilt was \w I|strong="H3588"\w* brought \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* birth, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* did \w my|strong="H3045"\w* mother conceive \w me|strong="H5048"\w*.

\w It|strong="H6213"\w*â€™s \w the|strong="H6213"\w* innermost truth \w you|strong="H6213"\w* desire, \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6213"\w* true wisdom \w of|strong="H5869"\w* heart.
Purge me clean \w with|strong="H5771"\w* hyssop, wash me whiter than snow.
Fill \w me|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* joy \w and|strong="H2451"\w* gladness, let \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bones \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* broken rejoice.
Hide \w your|strong="H3526"\w* face \w from|strong="H2398"\w* my \w sins|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H2398"\w* blot out my guilt altogether.
Create \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* clean \w heart|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, put \w a|strong="H3068"\w* new steadfast spirit within \w me|strong="H8085"\w*.

Cast \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w forth|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, withdraw \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* holy spirit.

Give \w me|strong="H3559"\w* back \w the|strong="H3559"\w* joy \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* help, \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* willing \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w sustain|strong="H3559"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* teach \w your|strong="H3947"\w* ways \w to|strong="H6440"\w* transgressors, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* sinners \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* turn \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

Save \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* blood, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* tongue \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* ring \w out|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* faithfulness.
Open \w my|strong="H7725"\w* lips, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* mouth \w shall|strong="H1870"\w* declare \w your|strong="H7725"\w* praise.

\w For|strong="H7442"\w* \w in|strong="H8668"\w* sacrifice \w you|strong="H5337"\w* \w have|strong="H5337"\w* no pleasure, \w in|strong="H8668"\w* gifts \w of|strong="H1818"\w* burnt-offering no delight.

\w The|strong="H5046"\w* sacrifice pleasing \w to|strong="H6310"\w* God \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spirit \w that|strong="H6310"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* broken; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w* \w that|strong="H6310"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* crushed, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w not|strong="H6605"\w* despise.
Do good \w in|strong="H2654"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Zion, build \w the|strong="H3588"\w* walls \w of|strong="H2077"\w* Jerusalem.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* welcome \w the|strong="H7665"\w* due forms \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, \w then|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* altars \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* bullocks \w be|strong="H3808"\w* offered.
